front.title: Local Security Association (LSA): The Temporary Shared Key (TSK)

abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism to set up a Local SecurityAssociation (LSA) between a user and the local network where the useris attaching to the Internet. It defines all the required relatedfunctionalities such as the key generation, distribution and updateprocedures; it also describes the reasons and the benefits of theadoption of such LSA.
